title: Design notes: generate keys flow > Password screen
body:
## Problem 
Suggestions/issues on implementation in Figma are [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS/Feedback-for-Mobile?node-id=1922-172632&t=IygHPkoLwgiVR8Xa-4)


## Expected fixes

### First step
- [ ] Active first input with  opened keyboard (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428342839))
- [ ] Update "eye" icon (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428346840))
- [ ]  Update icon "Min 10 chars" (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428343023))
- [ ] Update background (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#429038637))

### Security tips
- [ ]  Fix keyboard overlapping with "Confirm password"(full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428356533))
- [ ]  "I understand my password can't be recovered" should appear only when passwords match (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428356770))

### Errors
- [ ]  Update icon (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428370344))

### Disclaimer
- [ ]  Checkbox white/black (full comment [here](https://www.figma.com/file/Tf5nfkYvpbnNCo4rKLK7lS?node-id=1922:172632#428375016))
